html:
PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2023-12242023-12-08ESDC
ActCanada Student Financial Assistance Act
Apprentice Loans Act
Canada Student Loans Act
SubjectRegulations Amending Certain Regulations Related to Student Loans and Apprentice Loans
PrecisRegulations Amending CERTAIN REGULATIONS RELATED TO STUDENT LOANS AND APPRENTICE LOANS in order to (1) remove regulatory authorities to prescribe interest-free and interest-reduced periods, and remove or amend interest-related provisions in the Canada Student Financial Assistance Regulations, the Canada Student Loans Regulations, and the Apprentice Loans Regulations (ALR); (2) create a process to establish a date for loan repayment independent of interest accrual and when payments are due, in case of ALR.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2023-0273 Publication Date: 2023-12-20
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Regulations Amending CERTAIN REGULATIONS RELATED TO STUDENT LOANS AND APPRENTICE LOANS in order to (1) remove regulatory authorities to prescribe interest-free and interest-reduced periods, and remove or amend interest-related provisions in the Canada Student Financial Assistance Regulations, the Canada Student Loans Regulations, and the Apprentice Loans Regulations (ALR); (2) create a process to establish a date for loan repayment independent of interest accrual and when payments are due, in case of ALR.
